Author: Lucky7btc
Title: [Ann]YOYOW-You Own Your Own Words-A media content producing and sharing platform
Body: YOYOW Progress Report Feb. 27st 2017 Develop performance https://twitter.com/InfoYoyow Newly added features  1. Platforms  Platforms can be registered with the form of decentralization and be integrated into YOYOW blockchain, it also lay the solid foundation for subsequent richer functionality. However, in the previous test network, platforms need be verified by YOYOW team. After this main net hard fork, platforms owner can make their own registration and integrated into YOYOW as they want, meanwhile, YOYOW team will provides constantly updates Web api middleware to platforms for the convenience of integration. Now you can find YOYOW middleware on github and the link is https://github.com/yoyow-org/yoyow-node-sdk/blob/master/middleware/README.md  2. Content publication  The feature that content can be stored on blockchain has been released officially. Platforms owner can store content, hash values of content and other information on YOYOW blockchain depends on their needs.  3. The feature that users authorize platform tipping management  Users can authorize right of tipping management to platforms, which is convenient to follow-up nonsensitive operation.  Tipping management is YOYOW’s unique delegated authentication with limited access permission mechanism according to the principle of least privilege. Users may authorize any platforms to exercise their authentication privilege whereas the authorized platforms cannot access users’ keys in the process so as to maintain a high level of security and better user experience.  Bug fixed 1. YOYOW team follow up and fixed dos bug of Graphene toolkit.  2. JS Serialization / Deserialization bug has been fixed.  I think this coin is going to be a real big winner soon...

Author: Gareth73
Title: [Ann]YOYOW-You Own Your Own Words-A media content producing and sharing platform
Body: So I got a reply from someone on the YOYOW section of the bitshares forum.  It seems you need to transfer your BTS token to yoyow.out with your ethereum wallet address in the comment, then you will receive the ERC20 tokens.  Here is the message:  YOYOW内盘代币将于8月31日20：00开放提币 YOYOW内盘代币将于8月31日20：00至9月2日12：00期间开放YOYOW提币，在这个时间段您可以将内盘的yoyow转账到yoyow.out这个账号，对应的数字ID为#395262（复核），您需要在备注里提供支持ERC20代币的ETH地址（如imtoken、币安充值地址等），YOYOW官方会在9月2日24：00之前处理完所有的BTS内盘提币申请。 注意事项： 1.一旦提交内盘提币申请之后，近期不再接受内盘充值的申请。 2.如果忘记备注ERC20代币的ETH地址，请在3号之后再联系客服处理。 3.YOYOW官方已经跟其他ICO平台完成结算，如果还没有发放代币，请联系对应的ICO平台。 4.YOYOW上币初步计划:9月3号币安，9月4号海风藤 币盈网，其他交易所陆续排期中。  There is something about some dates that I am not clear about. I sent my tokens from openledger but am still waiting to receive the ERC20 tokens in my ether wallet.  Good luck   Edit, received my ERC20 tokens to day.

Author: yo-yow
Title: [Ann]YOYOW-You Own Your Own Words-A media content producing and sharing platform
Body: Update 2017/01/16  :More FAQ: What is YOYOW? YOYOW is a blockchain based media content producing and sharing platform, named from“You Own Your Own Words”. By rewarding content producers, YOYOW accumulates high quality content and develops its own community. Simply speaking, YOYOW is a decentralized Question&Anwser plus knowledge sharing platform. Compared with traditional medial platform, what pain points YOYOW have resolved?    Users on traditional media platform contribute to the platform but get no monetary reward.    High quality content on traditional media platform tends to be buried by trash contents over time.     The expense of managing a traditional platform is high.  Compared with traditional medial platform, what’s special for YOYOW?    YOYOW rewards content producers    YOYOW encourages users to select and promote high quality content and rewards these users    YOYOW gives all the users the power of voting and encourages the whole community to take part in the management.  What are the most innovative features of YOYOW?    An article can be set as investment mode to encourage good content digging and sharing, and the initial price is determinate by the author. If other users like this article and invest on this article, any potential profits coming from this article will be shared between the author and investors.     Advertiser can reduce their cost by making high quality advertisement, because even advertisement can be liked and upvoted by users.    Light applications will add more scenarios for consuming tokens  Why YOYOW is blockchain based? Blockchain is a distributed database that maintains a continuously-growing list of ordered records called blocks. By design blockchains are inherently resistant to modification of the data — once recorded, the data in a block cannot be altered retroactively. This is what YOYOW needs as a media content producing platform.  What are the business model of YOYOW? YOYOW can be looked as a media platform, and the tokens are actually the shares of the whole platform. Part of the shares will be distributed to the contributors, who are platform builders, content producers, diggers and promoters, to encourage users to produce more high quality content, thus attracting advertisers and content purchasers. All income of the platform will be distributed to share holders.  How the contribution is evaluated and how the profits are distributed? A fixed amount of tokens are released daily, and they are distributed among all users according to the contribution. The contribution evaluation mechanism is based on voting, in other words, it’s all decided by shareholders. To note that initial shares owned by developers' team will not participate the voting.     What are the rights and interests of shareholders? Similar to traditional corporations, shareholders have the right to:    Share all profits from all kinds of platform income, including advertisement and content selling    Vote for committee to determine the major change of system parameters    The difference with traditional corporations is all the operations are transparent and in real time on blockchain, which is much more reliable and efficient.  What are the profit model of YOYOW? As a decentralized autonomous corporation(DAC), YOYOW is designed to feed itself by the following means:    Advertisement: Advertisers need to buy and burn YOYOW tokens to post their advertisement.    Transaction fee: trading, market prediction and internal gaming all produce transaction fee.    Premium member service: YOYOW will provide value-added service by means of system plug-in. Free users need to buy the service to become premium member.  What about the content regulation? YOYOW is designed to obey local laws, therefore, the content regulation is necessary. Specifically, YOYOW maintains the display of content by means of:    Illegal content will be recognized by certain algorithms and be filtered out on front end UI.    Shareholders can downvote illegal content to make it not displayed on UI.    Blockchain fork could be exploited for severe violation of rules.     What’s the difference between steemit and YOYOW?    For bottom layer implementation, both are using Graphene toolkit.    YOYOW focus on Chinese community where the influence of Steemit is weak.    For the product logic, steemit is more like a blockchain version reddit, whereas YOYOW is more like a blockchain verison Quora.  How the data of YOYOW are saved? All text and link information are saved on blockchain. Pictures, videos, songs are saved on centralized server. Also, IPFS network is another choice for better security and privacy.   Is YOYOW decentralized? In terms of content regulation, YOYOW is centralized. In terms of shares distribution and managing, YOYOW is decentralized. After YOYOW survive the early stage, it will aim to gradually get decentralized to become a DAC.  How the tokens are distributed? The details of total amount and distribution mechanism will be announced together with ICO plan, please be patient. After all tokens are distributed, the investors, the developers and content rewards will occupy 1/3, respectively.

Author: all-chains
Title: [Ann]YOYOW-You Own Your Own Words-A media content producing and sharing platform
Body: Virtual Proof of Work (VPoW) PoW is recognized as the most fair distribution scheme, but it has several defects: 1\ The entry level participation has already been too high for common users, in either technical or financial aspect, whereas huge miners occupy most of the profit and control the whole network. 2\ Secret mining at very early stage when common users are still struggling to run the script can not be avoided, in this case, PoW is the most unfair distribution scheme. 3\ Waste of resource, not environment friendly.   Besides, one phenomenon we have observed in all the past ICOs is that the fund raised through ICO doesn’t depend on the product itself, instead, it depends more on the advertising campaign. Thus, the quality of product is not the highest priority to developers anymore   To avoid this, we have designed a new mechanism---VPoW. The concept of this mechanism is: a certain amount of tokens are created everyday in a curve that calculated from some specific algorithm. All of these tokens will be distributed to investors according to the proportion of shareholding. However, to get these tokens, investors need to send a certain amount of fund to a designated account which belongs to the developers’ team. The newly created tokens will be released linearly. The advantages of VPoW compared with PoW and PoS are: 1\ More fair opportunity for new comers of the community, thus less worries about selling pressure from early participants in the mode of PoS.     2\ Better way to raise fund for sustainable development, and the newly raised fund can be dynamically balanced depending on the acceptance of the product. 3\ Lower selling pressure from content producers and curators; a healthy way to keep the system running smoothly.  Wonderful!Genius!

Plus, a diverse and decentralized moderators team will help to monitor such things.  The essence of PoF is that any content that brings flow(except for illegal ones) to our platform can be rewarded, even bots. If the content that provided by a bot is more attractive and brings more clicks/votes, then this bot will be rewarded more, compared to a human.

Author: yo-yow
Title: [Ann]YOYOW-You Own Your Own Words-A media content producing and sharing platform
Body: http://olj8u567a.bkt.clouddn.com/cover_1.jpg    Website   DESCRIPTION  YOYOW is a blockchain based DAC incentivizing user generated content(UGC) , named from “You Own Your Own Words”. By rewarding content creators, YOYOW generates high quality content and develops community of knowledge. On YOYOW, the standard to evaluate the contributions of users (including platform builders, content producers and participants) is the value of bringing traffic to YOYOW platform. According to this criteria of assessment, YOYOW offers monetary and equity stake rewards. The first product of YOYOW will be a question-and-answer platform.    MISSION  The vision of YOYOW is to make the knowledge worth more, thus to inspire people to create high quality content.    BACKGROUND  Active users, premium content providers and spreaders brings massive traffic and billions of dollars of profit to social media platforms such as Facebook, Twitter and Reddit. However,  users on those platforms have no monetary reward, and the contribution to the platforms made by these users is neglected by shareholders. users on those platforms don’t own the content they produced---neither the control nor the profit. YOYOW takes advantage of blockchain technology to build a transparent and highly effective evaluating system. Furthermore, YOYOW fairly quantify the contribution of users and pay them by money and shares. Additionally, by giving users the rights of control, management, and dividends, YOYOW redefines the community ecosystem and economic model to create a new social media platform.        Introduction   The market position of YOYOW YOYOW is a media platform YOYOW builds its own community by rewarding high quality content YOYOW encourage users to add value to platform by giving away shares for their contribution The reward mechanism is based on an algorithm called PoF(Proof of Flow)   YOYOW is a media DAC(Distributed Autonomous Corporation) YOYOW runs on blockchain where all transactions are recorded YOYOW needs to make profits for its shareholders YOYOW will be focus on Chinese community As it is a media platform, language will be a huge obstacle to prevent different people from communicating smoothly. Although it is not unconquerable, the cost to maintain a multi-language platform at the early stage will be high. Therefore, YOYOW will only focus on Chinese community at the beginning.   Product usage  The use of YOYOW is simple, you wouldn’t find any difficulty if you are familiar with traditional social media platform.  Wechat account can be used as authorization method to register accounts on YOYOW.  The difference of YOYOW with traditional platform is that every vote of a user might affect the benefits of content producers, thus affect the evolution of the whole ecosystem and the growth of community. Every shareholder can upvote or downvote the content published on YOYOW. Content contributor will get profits and shares of platform according to the votes they get from other users. High quality content diggers and promoters also share the profits of  content    Equity allocation  We realize the mechanism of equity allocation is the key point for a platform to survive in long term.  Shareholders may do the job, but there are a few obvious disadvantages: Investors may not overlap with active community users, therefore investors may lack the most accurate sense of judgment. There could be conflict of interests. The vision of YOYOW is to make the valuable content worth more, and encourage users to create more high quality content. Therefore, to assure a fair mechanism for judgment of content is a critical point.  YOYOW splits the equity into two parts---YOYO and WORDS.  Both YOYO and WORDS represent the power of voting. As YOYOW is evolving and attracting more and more users, WORDS will take a higher portion thus dilute the voting power of YOYO. The possible distribution ways of WORDS include sharedrop, giveaway, transfer, purchase, etc..   The regulation of content  Considering the high risk of media content in China, by design YOYOW has a hierarchical content regulation system to guarantee the compliance. The front-end and bottom layer database are separated, thus only the filtered content can be displayed. The illegal content can be edited by administrators on the level of blockchain. Reputation system will gradually be exploited, thus the behavior of common users can be guided.   Centralized V.S. Decentralized  From the perspective of the management architecture, some kind of centralization can be traced. It is a dilemma but certain degree of centralization is very necessary: Under the current circumstance, the regulation of content determines the survival or extinction of media platform. Blockchain is just a tool to make this product better. The more critical issue that YOYOW needs to resolve is the feasibility and profitability of the whole ecosystem. If YOYOW is proven to be able to survive and profit, then gradually YOYOW will evolve to exploit more intelligent algorithm instead of manual intervention for operation. For example, the judgment of copyright and following operation.   Product model： YOYOW Community YOYOW focuses on the high quality content production, and it is highly adaptive with many types of media platform, such as reddit, twitter and quora. One of the main focuses of YOYOW is developing blockchain version Quora.  Third party Communities Third party communities can take advantage of YOYOW’s by transfer their content to YOYOW and accept upvoting.   Accounts settings  Accounts: the YOYO made from PoF has a freezing period for observation to avoid piracy and patent infringement. Token days: To improve the user experience, the concept of “token days” will be exploited. Reputation system： Reputation system is brought up to protect the compliance of YOYOW platform. If a user breaked the rule, his/her honor point on YOYOW will be affected, thus the power of voting is degraded. If the reputation of a user is at a very low level, he will lose the ability to profit from YOYOW, unless he spends much time on recovering his reputation points.   Distribution of Shares  There is a maximum dilution rate for shares distribution but there is no minimum value. The dilution rate could be adjusted flexibly by shareholders, as well as many others parameters like the maximum income of each post. Also, the committee will take part in the system administration.    WHITEPAPER  http://www.yoyow.org/files/YOYOW-non-technical-whitepaper-EN.pdf.    FAQ   What is YOYOW?  YOYOW is a blockchain-based question-and-answer platform , named from “You Own Your Own Words”. By rewarding content creators, YOYOW generates high quality content and develops community of knowledge.   Compares to traditional platforms, why YOYOW is better? Users on traditional platform get no monetary reward but in YOYOW, high quality content creators can earn from what they created High quality content on traditional content platform tends to be buried by trash contents over time.   The cost of managing a centralized traditional platform is high. YOYOW encourages users to upvote and promote high quality contents and YOYOW rewards not only users that create contents but also users that upvote and promote contents. YOYOW gives all users the power of voting and encourages the entire community to take part in management.   What are the most innovative features of YOYOW? Articles can be set as investment mode to encourage high quality content upvote and sharing, and the initial price is determinated by authors. If other users like the article and invest on the article, any potential profits coming from this article will be shared between author and investors.   Advertisers can reduce their cost by making high quality advertisement - if advertisement upvoted by users, the cost will be reduced. Light applications will add more scenarios for consuming tokens   Why YOYOW is blockchain based?  Blockchain is a distributed database that maintains a continuously-growing list of ordered records — once recorded, the data in a block cannot be altered retroactively. This is what YOYOW needs as a content platform.   The business model of YOYOW  YOYOW can be looked as a media platform, and the tokens are actually the shares of the platform. A part of shares will be distributed to contributors, who are platform builders, content producers, diggers and promoters, to encourage users to produce more high quality content, thus attracting advertisers and content purchasers. All income of the platform will be distributed to share holders.   How the contribution is evaluated and how the profits are distributed?  A fixed amount of tokens are released daily, and they are distributed among all users according to their contributions. The contribution evaluation mechanism is based on voting. To note that initial shares owned by developers' team will not participate the voting.       What are the rights and interests of shareholders?  Similar to traditional corporations, shareholders have the right to: ●   Share all profits from platform income, including advertisement and content selling ●   The difference with traditional corporations is all the operations are transparent and in real time on blockchain, which is much more reliable .   What is the profit model of YOYOW?  As a decentralized autonomous corporation (DAC), YOYOW is designed to feed itself by: ●   Advertisements: Advertisers need to buy and burn YOYOW tokens to post their advertisement. ●   Transaction fees: trading, market prediction and internal gaming etc. will generates transaction fees. ●   Premium member service: YOYOW will provide value-added service such as system plug-ins.   What about the content regulation?  YOYOW is designed to obey laws, therefore, the content regulation is necessary. Specifically, YOYOW maintains the display of content by means of: ●   Illegal content will be recognized by certain algorithms and be filtered out on front-end. ●   Shareholders can downvote illegal content to make it not to be displayed on front-end. ●   Like witness system used by bitshares, yoyow has a similar system called "Council".The members of Council are elected by stakeholders of the platform. Except for generate blocks, etc. the Council also has the right of removing content from the blockchain if it violates the law. BUT the removal right can only be used when majority reached in the Council.   What’s the difference between steemit and YOYOW?     ●   For bottom layer implementation, both use Graphene toolkit. ●   YOYOW focus on Chinese community where the influence of Steemit is weak. ●   steemit is more like a blockchain version reddit, whereas YOYOW is more like a blockchain verison Quora.   How the data of YOYOW are saved?  All text and link information are saved on blockchain. Pictures, videos, songs are saved on centralized server. Also, IPFS network is another choice for better security and privacy.   Is YOYOW decentralized?  In terms of content Compliance, YOYOW is centralized. In terms of shares distribution and managing, YOYOW is decentralized. After early stage, it will aim to gradually get decentralized to become a DAC.   How the tokens are distributed?   The total 1,000 million tokens will be distributed among :  Investors: 500 million developers team: 300 million Reserved for promotion foundation: 200 million     More details will be coming out with the ICO Announcement.    YOYOW team  Currently there are more than 10 prime members in YOYOW team including two underlying developers, two front end developers, product managers, media operation, public relations and blockchain seniors as product consultant. Two underlying developers were former Bitshares developers and they are very familiar with Graphene platform. Front-end developers include leading developer familiar with Bitshares front-end architecture, and professional App developer. Most of our members are from Bitshares community, where they proved themselves in community development (build function, bug fixs, set up ecology, media operation). They are volunteers to work in Bitshares and keep for a long time.   Last but not least  There are chances that investors might worry: these details should be published after product launch, especially considering other platforms based on blockchain do not have a clear product plan and business model. The reason we are doing this is because: 1. YOYOW team would like to share some thoughts, just like our inspiration comes from exploration of other pioneers. 2. YOYOW team would like to provide enough information for investors to decide its feasibility and welcome any comments and discussions.    DEVELOP PLAN  step 1. Develop YOYOW bottom and  version Qura+.  step 2. Add the reality prediction function. http://olj8u567a.bkt.clouddn.com/cover_2.jpg  step 3. API open to third party developers. http://olj8u567a.bkt.clouddn.com/cover_3.jpg  step 4. Hierarchical incentives：  step 5. Content sharing：  step 6. Finally, http://olj8u567a.bkt.clouddn.com/cover_4.jpg   YOYOW as a bottom platform provide service for UGC communities, such as： ●   Content evaluating and rewarding ●   General accounts ●   Value circulation    Latest Announcement  https://steemit.com/cn/@jademont/ann-yoyow-main-net-is-up-and-tokens-conversion-notes-yoyow  https://bitsharestalk.org/index.php/topic,24948.0.html   •••    Media information  http://mt.sohu.com/20160929/n469420278.shtml?qq-pf-to=pcqq.c2c  http://www.btc38.com/btc/altgeneral/12864.html  http://www.aboutchain.com/forum.php?mod=forumdisplay&fid=89   http://olj8u567a.bkt.clouddn.com/dacnow.jpg Scan QR code to join our WeChat.
